name: Xijulba
content:
Xijulba was a male Dug who was a member of the family of the famous Sebulba and also the Sebolto Clan on Malastare. In 32 BBY, he had a bounty posted on his head by a hateful rival of his podracing relative, Mawhonic. The bounty was eventually collected by the bounty hunter, Jango Fett.
Xijulba's bounty was 2,000 credits alive and 1,000 credits dead. It was left for the player to decide, however considering that Xijulba was worth more alive.
